original_text: While Araunah was threshing wheat, he turned and saw the angel; his four sons who were with him hid themselves.
korean_text: 그 때에 오르난이 밀을 타작하다가 돌이켜 천사를 보고 오르난이 네 명의 아들과 함께 숨었더니

sentences.original_text: he turned and saw the angel
his four sons who were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 있던 그의 네 아들들은
